subject: Order issues
description_text:
With my order SSN5789
I noticed the city is Plainfield,in 46168. It's supposed to be
Indianapolis,in 46201 all other information is correct! Can this be fixed
before it's picked up by FedEx? 909 n olney st Plainfield,in 46168 doesn't
exist. It's supposed to be 909 n olney st Indianapolis,in 46201

conversations.body_text: Hi James Clouse,    Alright, we've contacted the staff at our U.S. warehouse to make the necessary adjustments for you.
